meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unaware or unconscious.
meanings.sent1: Her insensibleness to the danger around her led to a serious accident.
meanings.sent2: The insensibleness of the patient's condition required immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent3: Despite his insensibleness to the cold, he insisted on wearing shorts in winter.
meanings.sent4: The insensibleness of the situation hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The insensibleness of his actions left everyone in shock.

meanings.definition: The inability to feel or perceive sensations.
meanings.sent1: The insensibleness of his fingertips made playing the guitar difficult.
meanings.sent2: She was born with insensibleness in her sense of smell.
meanings.sent3: His insensibleness to spicy food always surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The insensibleness of his touch was a concern for the doctors.
meanings.sent5: The insensibleness of taste buds can affect one's enjoyment of food.

meanings.sent1: His insensibleness remarks hurt her feelings.
meanings.sent2: The insensibleness approach of the company towards customer complaints was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: Despite his insensibleness to social cues, he managed to make friends easily.
meanings.sent4: The insensibleness attitude of the teacher towards the students was evident.
meanings.sent5: Her insensibleness behavior towards others caused misunderstandings.
